MOVE_FLEET: I am moving the fleet from your sector.
LIKE_GREET: Nice to see warm person in cool space.
DEFESIVE_PACT: Let's form guarding pact, what say you?
BORDER_WARS: Your puny %1$s has been detected. Prepare to encounter hot blazing war from us!
ASK_PROTECTION: I am ready to pay for my fleet protection for 5 star years.
ASK_MOVE_FLEET: Your fleet %1$s has entered into my sector. Remove it!
OFFER_SPY_TRADE: I offer you our spy information for 20 star years. Interested?
MAKE_WAR: Prepare to encounter hot blazing war from us!%1$s
OFFER_ACCEPTED: I accept your offer with warm!
TRADE_EMBARGO: Are you will to do trade embargo for 20 star years against %1$s?
DECLINE_WAR: This offer is so bad, I'll explode and prepare yourself for war!%1$s
ACKNOWLEDGE_WAR: We will crush you like a pebble stone!
NOTHING_TO_TRADE: You don't seem to have even pebble to trade.
DECLINE_ANGER: This offer makes me blazing hot and I getting close to explode!
ALLIANCE: Let's stand together like rocks and defend ourselves!
DECLINE: I'll have to cool down this offer.
TRADE_ALLIANCE: Let's start trading together, what is your answer?
DISLIKE_GREET: Ah, something to put into smelting pot and eat up...
DEMAND: Accept this or I will eat you like a pebble stone!
HATE_GREET: Be quick or I will explode...
AGREE: This deal makes me warm inside.
PEACE_OFFER: There is room for both of us.
INSULT_RESPOND: You seem like a good fuel for furnace...
